attributes.title: racist picture
attributes.review: When I first opened this app, I was in shocked of what I saw an racist picture. It was so rude that our president thinks that different people that have different skins are different. He doesn’t care about them. If he was a better president, he would give respect to ever single race in the world, but instead he cares about himself. I hate trump. That’s why I’m giving this app a 1 star review because of how horrible that picture was.

attributes.title: Um no ❤️
attributes.review: So I got this app and it took TEN DAYS to load, thenn when I opened the app my dog turned into a chicken and my cat turned to dust before my eyes!! I’m horrified. If that wasn’t enough, I went on the app again to like reverse what happened and a freaking MOLE PERSON was outside my window staring at me. We had a 20 hour staring contest and now my eyes are like sand. I decided to open it one more time and guess what?!? I’m in the freaking ocean...what the hell do I do now.

attributes.title: No❤️🙈🥰
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app. I had been scouring the App Store for days trying to find the perfect app where I could show my love for.        ❤️Donald 🤍Trump💙. But as soon as I opened the app this scary Cheeto with baby hands and corn husk hair was staring back at me. It scared me so bad that for the past few MONTHS all I can see is that Cheeto baby man watching me as I fall asleep. DO NOT DOWNLOAD the app unless you want to be scarred for life. But I still say TRUMP 2020🇺🇸;)#allcountriesmatter

attributes.title: ✨no✨
attributes.review: when I opened the app told told me I had to pay a small loan of a million dollars for his fans only. i already saw it for free on twitter. also i wouldn’t recommend sexual behavior towards someone’s own child. so that’s a no for me chief. also i do wanna say congrats for drinking with one hand. i hold beers in both of mine. the kids in the back of my mouth and stomach have more fun there then i do suffering in America with a Cheeto president. have a nice day.

attributes.title: Glitchy much
attributes.review: Took forever to download then when it finished my phone’s storage was low the battery got sucky and tik tok almost glitched the place that makes me feel happy and laugh and safe knowing I can relate to others is amazing come to find out trump wants to ban tik tok because some people have amazing political views and some are not afraid to speak opinion and or the right of speech I can’t believe this app ruins everything DO NOT GET

attributes.title: no❤️❤️😹😹
attributes.review: i initially got this app to support our president!!!!!!!! but when i opened it a man knocked on my doorbell✋🏾 he asked me ‘are you lost babygorl’. I WAS IN MY OWN HOUSE!!! 😾😾later HE KIDNAPPED ME. 😿😿He told me he was going to give me 365 days to fall in love with him!👻. i asked him who he was and he said he knew about me when i downloaded the app!!!😨😨 WHAT? THIS APP IS GIVING AWAY MY DETAILS TO THE ITALIAN MAFIA. 😤🤬🤬🤬I did end up falling in love with him in 3 weeks! anyway don’t get this app because the italian mafia can kidnap u🥶.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING APP 🤢🤮
attributes.review: I can’t even exaggerate how messed up this app is. I wanted to pay respects to the big Cheeto man, and then I soon find out that the app glitched and it showed a naked and inappropriate photo of him. What kind of person and president thinks that it’s ok to do this. I also get text threats because to get in the app, you have put in your number. This is awful and I would NEVER recommend. Dear Apple, Delete it IMMEDIATELY from the App Store. So inappropriate.

This is the worst app ever. As soon as opened the app I saw the one and only Cheeto man. Eventually the Cheeto man started to visit me in my dreams. I would wake up and see him hovering over me. The Cheeto man always had a special message for me. Yesterday it was, Dixie demilio’s song, buyyyt sometimes Don’t wanna be happy. Last night it was a creepy banana man repeatedly saying banana in a demonic voice. That is why I give this app a one star. I wish I could give it zero.

attributes.title: Just a disgusting app
attributes.review: Wow, have you ever wanted to go on your phone for some nice zen reading well this is NOT the app for you. I opened the app for the first time and the first thing I see is a nasty 🤢🤮 white old man who likes little to be with girls and even his own daughter!! Then it asks for so much personal information it’s like the man wants to stalk me or something. I’m just in disbelief and disgust that this even is an app that you can get! MAJOR ISSUES!

attributes.title: SMELLLYYY 🤮🤢💩
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support a shrimpy orange cheese ball 🍊🍤🍤 when all of a sudden i got diarrhea. I then went to the bathroom and i saw #SAVEBARRONTRUMP plastered on my wall 🥴🤭😵. I TRIED TO WIPE IT OFF AND ALL OF A SUDDEN IT SAID “.....HELLO” just like melanie said 😶. NEXT THING IK I HAD TRUMP’S NUDESS AS MY LOCKSCREEN 😳🤯🤯🤯. Then opened the app again when my dog suddenly started singing “TRUMP 2020, LETS EAT TIDE PODS YEAH!!!!!” he then started flying a round my house TRYING TO GO GET THE TIDE PODS IN MY LAUNDRY ROOOM 🤐. Then he died cause a bunch of farts starting erupting from his butthole. DO NOT DOWNLOAD APP IT IS DEMONIC AND WILL RUIN UR DOGG !!!
